title: Georgia Power joins industry in seeking court's intervention for EPA's Clean Power Plan (Southern Company) ...
text: ( Source : Southern Company ) Georgia Power joins industry in seeking court's intervention for EPA 's Clean Power Plan Overreaching regulation extends beyond agency's authority and will impact Georgia customers ATLANTA, Oct. 23, 2015 / PRNewswire
